about_the_game:
Using an array of investigative tools, including EVP recorders, spirit boxes, and infrared cameras, you must collect evidence of the paranormal and piece together the tragic history. But beware—the more you uncover, the more hostile the spirits become. Some will try to communicate, others will try to trap you in their eternal torment.

  • Features:

    • A chilling narrative-driven experience blending psychological horror and supernatural investigation.

    • Use realistic paranormal equipment.

    • Dynamic, unpredictable environments that change as you progress.

    • Multiple endings, depending on the choices you make and the evidence you uncover.

    • Spine-chilling atmosphere with immersive audio design that will keep you on edge.

The haunted places have a grim past that may be intertwined with dark rituals, tragic deaths, and ancient secrets long buried. Your every move triggers unsettling phenomena—echoes of tortured souls, fleeting shadows, and cryptic whispers that seem to follow your every step. The spirits of the past are restless, and they don’t want you to uncover the truth.

If a portal opens up in front of you, would you go through it?

content_descriptors.notes: Similar level of violence to Far Cry 6.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-6700 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i7-12700 or Ryzen 7 7800X3D
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 SUPER or Radeon RX 5700 XT or Arc A770
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
